trans-unit.source: Represents information about a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje informacje o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain identifying information for an initialized recognition engine using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object.
trans-unit.target: Możesz uzyskać informacje identyfikujące aparatu rozpoznawania zainicjowane przy użyciu <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>dla <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>obiektu lub <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>dla <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>obiektu.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The information returned in instances of RecognizerInfo obtained from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> is determined by the settings in the **Speech Properties** member of the **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Informacje zwracane wystąpienia RecognizerInfo uzyskane z <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>zależy od ustawień w **właściwości mowy** członkiem **Panelu sterowania**.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: You can use instances of RecognizerInfo to construct a specific configuration of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Można utworzyć określonej konfiguracji wystąpień RecognizerInfo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>przy użyciu <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29>konstruktora.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The static method <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> returns a list of all available <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configurations as RecognizerInfo instances.
trans-unit.target: Statyczna metoda <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>zwraca listę wszystkich dostępnych <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>konfiguracje jako wystąpień RecognizerInfo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets additional information about a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera dodatkowe informacje <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> containing information about the configuration of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca wystąpienie klasy <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> zawierający informacje o konfiguracji <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture supported by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera język obsługiwany przez <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object can include the name of the culture, the associated language, the country/region, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>obiektu mogą obejmować nazwę kultury, skojarzone języka kraj/region, używany kalendarz i sposób formatowania dat i sortowania ciągów.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the culture supported by a given <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca informacje o kulturze obsługiwany przez dany <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera opis <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that describes the configuration for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> opisujący konfiguracji dla określonego <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the `RecognizerInfo` object.
trans-unit.target: Usuwa `RecognizerInfo` obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera identyfikator <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: The identifier returned by the Id property is the same as the token name of the recognition engine in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: Identyfikator zwrócony przez właściwość Id jest taka sama jak nazwa tokenu aparatu rozpoznawania w rejestrze systemu Windows.

trans-unit.source: Returns the identifier for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca identyfikator dla określonego <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the friendly name of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera przyjazną nazwę <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: Returns the friendly name for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca przyjazną nazwę dla określonego <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio formats supported by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera format audio, obsługiwanych przez <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of audio formats supported by a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca listę formatów audio obsługiwanych przez określony <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> lub <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> wystąpienia.
